quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Quote
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, technique, black-and-white. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In cinematography, a close-up of an object or detail within a scene is referred to as what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Insert shot

questions.question: What movie directed by Tim Burton was filmed completely in black-and-white?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ed Wood

questions.question: This device, consisting of one or more film projectors mechanically linked to a movie camera, can be used for making special effects for motion pictures or for copying and restoring old film material.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Optical Printer

questions.question: When used by editors in the film industry, the acronym E.D.L. stands for what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Edit Decision List

questions.question: In photography and cinematography, this type of light, sometimes called hair or shoulder light, provides separation between the subject and its background.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Back Light

questions.question: In the film industry open and closed refer to what element of composition?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The frame

questions.question: In the film industry, the term 2:3 pulldown refers to what?

options.text: The optimal difference of intensities between the key and the fill in high key lighting
The amount of delay within in a recorded scene
The conversion of film to video
The order of a shot list

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The conversion of film to video

questions.question: In the film industry, this common household item, known as C47, is used as a small gripping tool or a quick fastener, especially when dealing with lighting.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A clothespin

questions.question: What legendary Hollywood actress portrayed Lady Marian in the 1976 movie Robin and Marian, starring Sean Connery as Robin Hood?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Audrey Hepburn

questions.question: Identify the 1982 movie from the quote: I know Im human. And if you were all these things, then youd just attack me right now, so some of you are still human.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Thing

questions.question: Slow motion is is a technique in filmmaking most commonly referred to as what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Overcranking

questions.question: Which of these Tim Burton movies stars Johnny Depp?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: This film term is defined as a type of filmic organization in which the parts relate to each other through a series of causally related events taking place in time and space.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Narrative

questions.question: What 1973 movie is this quote from: Youre telling me that I should take my daughter to a witch doctor? Is that it??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Exorcist

questions.question: What 1992 movie contains the quote, You are not content with the stories, so I was obliged to come.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Candyman

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Quote and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, portray, quote. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: identify the 1979 movie from the quote: Okay. I see it, I see it all now. What we gotta do is we gotta snag that tall dude and stomp the s--t out of him, and well find out what the hell is going on up there.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phantasm

questions.question: Name the 2006 movie that contains the quote: Your people asked our families to leave the towns, and you destroyed our homes. We went into the mines, you set off your bombs, and turned everything to ashes. You made us what weve become.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Hills Have Eyes

questions.question: Tom Cruise starred opposite this Hollywood actress in the 1992 movie Far and Away.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicole Kidman

questions.question: What 1988 horror movie contains the quote, Lieutenant, Ive been going over your report. Seems you automatically assume it was a police officer instead of some lunatic son-of-a-b@@ch dressed up like a cop.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maniac Cop

questions.question: What is the occupation of Tom Cruises character Cole Trickle in the 1990 movie Days of Thunder?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Auto racer

questions.question: What 2002 horror movie is this quote from: Man has only been around for a few blinks of an eye. So if the infection wipes us all out, that is a return to normality.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 28 Days Later

questions.question: What character does Tom Cruise portray in the 1993 thriller movie The Firm?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Attorney

questions.question: What is the name of the vampire portrayed by Tom Cruise in the 1994 movie Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lestat

questions.question: What type of criminal does Tom Cruise portray in the 2004 crime thriller movie Collateral?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Assassin

questions.question: What 1995 movie is this quote from: Little Tommy Daggett. How I loved listening to your sweet prayers. Then you would hop into bed, afraid that I was hiding under it. And I was!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Prophecy

questions.question: What 2002 horror movie contains the quote, You start to play it and its like somebodys nightmare. And then this woman comes on, smiling at you, right? Seeing you...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Ring

questions.question: Which of these was Tom Cruises feature film debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Endless Love

questions.question: Identify the 1996 movie from the quote: Listen up. They found Principal Himbry dead. He was gutted and hung from the goal post on the football field.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scream

questions.question: Why does Peter get beaten up by a bar owner in the movie Forgetting Sarah Marshall?

options.text: He threw a glass at the bar owner.
He tried to pick up one of the girls that worked at the bar
He took a picture off the wall in the restroom.
He puked all over the bar owner.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He took a picture off the wall in the restroom.

questions.question: What happens to Tom Cruises character in the 2006 movie Mission: Impossible III?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He becomes a father.

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Godzilla and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, fiction, condition. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who is the director of the 2002 science fiction movie Minority Report that starred Tom Cruise and Colin Farrell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Spielberg

questions.question: What condition does the brother of Tom Cruises character suffer from in the 1988 Oscar-winning drama movie Rain Man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Autism

questions.question: Godzilla had his own comic book series produced by DC Comics.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In what year was the very first Godzilla movie produced?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1954

questions.question: What color is the nightgown worn by The Big Bad Wolf in the Shrek movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pink

questions.question: What is the name of the green-eyed Dronkey from the Shrek movies, whom Donkey calls my special boy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Babanas

questions.question: Did Godzilla ever appear in a film with another famous Japanese movie monster called Gamera?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: What film company produced the 1998 American film version of Godzilla?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tri-Star Pictures

questions.question: What is the nickname of the Gingerbread Man from the Shrek movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gingy

questions.question: In what year did Hanna-Barbera produce a Godzilla cartoon series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1978

questions.question: How many Godzilla movies were produced in Japan from the movie’s debut in 1954 to 2007?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 28

questions.question: Godzilla won a Lifetime Achievement Award by MTV in 1996.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of these is not one of Godzillas varied abilities?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laser vision

questions.question: What is the difference between the Three Blind Mice from the Shrek movies and the fairy-tale characters they were based on?

options.text: In the movies they are not sad.
In the movies they dont look alike.
In the movies one of them can see.
In the movies they have tails.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the movies they have tails.

questions.question: What type of character did Tom Cruise portray in the 1985 fantasy movie Legend?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hermit

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Julie and Valley Girl
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, randy, food. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What unusual phenomenon occurs when Snow White from the Shrek movies starts singing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Animals appear out of nowhere.

questions.question: What is the last name of Julie, the main character in the movie Valley Girl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richman

questions.question: Julies parents owned a Pizza Hut in the movie Valley Girl.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Valley Girl, what color do Julie and Tommy wear to the prom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pink

questions.question: At the end of the movie Valley Girl, where are Julie and Randy headed in the limo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Valley Sheridan

questions.question: Who is the only outlaw in the film 3:10 to Yuma who doesnt participate in the initial raid on the stagecoach?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ben Wade

questions.question: In what year did the popular 80s movie Valley Girl premiere?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1983

questions.question: What type of underwear does Pinocchio from the Shrek movies accidentally reveal he wears?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thongs

questions.question: Where did Julie first see Randy in the movie Valley Girl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: at the beach

questions.question: What does Cinderella do with her glass slippers in the Shrek movies?

options.text: She uses them as musical instruments, making them clink.
She carries them in her hands.
She keeps them in a box and never lets anyone touch them.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She uses them as weapons.

questions.question: What is the reason for the insane behavior of Merlin the wizard from the Shrek movies?

options.text: He has suffered a nervous breakdown.
He is possessed by a spirit.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He has suffered a nervous breakdown.

questions.question: What type of food does Donkey from the Shrek movies like most?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sweets

questions.question: In the movie Valley Girl, what type of food is mainly eaten during the party at Suzys house?

options.text: There is no mention of food

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sushi

questions.question: What weapon does Puss in Boots always carry around in the Shrek movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sword

questions.question: When Fred and Stacey meet in the movie Valley Girl, what does Fred say his favorite color is?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Magenta

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Yuma and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, hitchcocks, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What legendary Hollywood actress starred in Alfred Hitchcocks 1954 suspense movie Rear Window?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grace Kelly

questions.question: What kind of doctor is the doctor in the movie 3:10 to Yuma?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A veterinarian

questions.question: Who kills Evans in the western film 3:10 to Yuma?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charlie Prince

questions.question: What Alfred Hitchcock movie was voted the greatest thriller movie of all time, and the 14th best movie ever made, by the American Film Institute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Psycho

questions.question: How did Harry die in Alfred Hitchcocks 1955 movie The Trouble with Harry?

options.text: Miss Ivy Gravely killed him with her hiking boot.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From natural causes

questions.question: Why does Ben Wade kill Byron McElroy in 3:10 to Yuma?

options.text: Because he never knew when to shut up

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What Alfred Hitchcock movie starred Ingrid Bergman as the daughter of a convicted Nazi spy, and Cary Grant as government agent T.R. Devlin?

options.text: The Man Who Knew Too Much

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Notorious

questions.question: In 3:10 to Yuma, what is Ben Wades justification for shooting Tommy Darden?

options.text: He put the whole gang at risk.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He put the whole gang at risk.

questions.question: What movie directed by Alfred Hitchcock tells the story of an actress who has been wrongly accused of the murder of her colleague?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Murder!

questions.question: In the live action film Casper what was the last name of the family that befriended Casper?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harvey

questions.question: Owen Wilson makes a cameo in the movie 3:10 to Yuma.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In 3:10 to Yuma, how much money does Charlie Prince offer to anyone who shoots any member of the posse?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 200 dollars

questions.question: Which of these movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock tells the true story of a man who was wrongly accused of a crime?

options.text: The Man Who Knew Too Much

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Wrong Man

questions.question: How much money does Evans get for a days work in 3:10 to Yuma when he hires out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Two Dollars

questions.question: What town do they take Ben Wade to catch the 3:10 train in the western movie 3:10 to Yuma?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Contention

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Drama
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, hitchcocks. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What movie, released in 1976, is Alfred Hitchcocks final completed movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Family Plot

questions.question: What actress starred in the 1993 movie Flesh and Bone, also featuring Dennis Quaid, James Caan and Gwyneth Paltrow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meg Ryan

questions.question: Who directed, wrote and starred as the newly-elected President of the United States in the 2003 comedy movie Head of State?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chris Rock

questions.question: Who directed and starred in the 1993 drama movie The Man Without a Face?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mel Gibson

questions.question: What Academy Award did the 1989 drama movie My Left Foot receive?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Award for Best Actor

questions.question: This 1940 movie was Alfred Hitchcocks first American project, and won an Academy Award for Best Picture.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rebecca

questions.question: What popular Grammy Award-winning female singer and songwriter made her acting debut in the 1999 drama movie Music of the Heart, starring Meryl Streep?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gloria Estefan

questions.question: What pathological phobia does Marnie have in Alfred Hitchcocks 1964 movie Marnie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What actor portrayed agent 007 in the seventeenth James Bond movie GoldenEye in 1995?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pierce Brosnan

questions.question: What kind of company did Lillian found after the death of her husband Oscar in the 1992 comedy movie Brain Donors?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ballet company

questions.question: What is the name of Quints boat, named after the only natural enemy of the white shark, in Steven Spielbergs horror movie Jaws from 1975?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Orca

questions.question: Where is the 1946 horror movie The Beast With Five Fingers set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Italy

questions.question: What Hollywood actress turned down a role in Alfred Hitchcocks 1947 movie The Paradine Case?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Greta Garbo

questions.question: Who is the vengeful murderer in the 1992 thriller movie The Hand That Rocks the Cradle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The nanny

questions.question: In what black comedy does a struggling documentary filmmaker, played by Woody Allen, address the following words to his wife: Honey, youre the one who stopped sleeping with me, ok. Itll be a year come April 20th. I remember the date exactly, because it was Hitlers birthday.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crimes and Misdemeanors
